title: Manasa Diamond and Emerald Bridal Haaram with Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features a traditional Hyderabadi polish.
features: Exquisite filigree work inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry. The central Emerald pendant boasts intricate diamond detailing and pearl drops. The necklace features a floral design with strategically placed emeralds to enhance its traditional appeal and a modern touch, also each flower comes with a pearl drop.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Adds a touch of regality to any formal occasion.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds create a captivating sparkle. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, known for their expertise in traditional jewelry making. Symbolizes prosperity, good fortune, and eternal love. The pearl drops add an element of grace and femininity.
